archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Identify Overdue Party Bill/Invoice
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Identify a party bill/invoice that is overdue for payment.

properties.value: Identify Overdue Party Bill/Invoice identifies a party bill/invoice that is overdue for payment. The identification may be made using reports that monitor the amount of time a payment is past due or by a policy defined by Define Party Debt Collection Policies.
